About The Trip

A 12-14 day journey across China starting in Shanghai, venturing to the stunning Avatar Mountains of Zhangjiajie, and finishing in Beijing. We'll explore classic sights, take scenic high-speed train rides, visit ancient water towns, and experience dramatic mountain landscapes.
